original_text: And they taught in Judah, and had the book of the law of the Lord with them, and went about throughout all the cities of Judah, and taught the people.
korean_text: 그들이 여호와의 율법책을 가지고 유다에서 가르치되 그 모든 유다 성읍들로 두루 다니며 백성들을 가르쳤더라

sentences.original_text: and had the book of the law of the Lord with them
and went about throughout all the cities of Judah
